name: Car Race Legends
description:
If you like high speed driving with stunts, drifts and crashes this game has alot of fun for you to enjoy. Cross consecutive speed breakers and bumps with high speed to complete the challenge. Have you ever thought of what would happen if you cross over 100 speed bumps at more than 100km/h. Enjoy the amazing crashes of cars while crossing the consective bumps. You need to race the high speed car and cross consecutive speed bumps to the check points.

Features:
- Amazing 3D Graphics
- Simple controls
- Touch to accelerate
